text: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.
author: William Faulkner

text: Actions are the seeds of fate. Deeds grow into destiny.
author: Harry S. Truman

text: The constant assertion of belief is an indication of fear.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

text: I love fools' experiments. I am always making them.
author: Charles Darwin

text: You are a function of what the whole universe is doing in the same way that a wave is a function of what the whole ocean is doing.
author: Alan Watts

text: Decide upon your major definite purpose in life and then organize all your activities around it.
author: Brian Tracy

text: The act of taking the first step is what separates the winners from the losers.
author: Brian Tracy

text: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
author: Epictetus

text: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: Opportunity comes when you continually push forward.
author: Sonia Ricotti
